name: kunstmaan/utilities-bundle
description: The KunstmaanUtilitiesBundle makes your life easier by providing a couple of small but useful helper services you can use and re-use in your applications. We already implemented an easy to use cipher service and a shell helper service for you but feel free to send in a pull request with your additions. The shell helper allows you to run apps in the background, see if a process is running and has a method to kill a running process. The cipher service allow you to encode and decode strings using the Rijndael 256 cipher

suggest.kunstmaan/admin-bundle: ^5.0 - to be put into require-dev when ready
